name: What LIES Beneath (TeamMonsterLovin)
description:
A game made by Amanda Thompson and Allyson Cikor for Alberta Game Jam 2019

They visit you each night, clasping your hand as it hangs over the edge of the bed.

Each one an intriguing figure vying for your affection, but are they telling the truth? 

Your life may depend on your ability to figure out who is true, but with a shot a true love how could you not try?
